meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium, Video Conference Link: https://dallascityhall.webex.com/dallascityhall/j.php?MTID=m119199a81d2fc681a91a4fb63b377f96

agenda_items.title: Senior Services Strategic Plan – Senior Affairs Commission (SAC) Listening Session
agenda_items.description: Senior Services Strategic Plan Consultants, Guidehouse, Inc. and CoSpero Consulting along with Office of Community Care and Empowerment staff will provide an update on the strategic plan’s progress. During the presentation, the consultants will engage the Commission with targeted questions to gain insights into the Commissioners' priorities and their perspectives on the community's evolving needs for aging services.
